# removeView(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a specified view from the stack view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeView(_ view: NSView)
```

## Parameters

- **view**: The view you want to remove from the stack view.



## Discussion

This method removes a view from a stack view whether the view is attached or detached. For an attached view only, you can alternatively call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView/removeFromSuperview()] method on the view.

## Managing Views in Gravity Areas

- **addView(_:in:)**: Adds a view to the end of the stack view gravity area.
- **insertView(_:at:in:)**: Adds a view to a stack view gravity area at a specified index position.
- **setViews(_:in:)**: Specifies an array of views for a specified gravity area in the stack view, replacing any previous views in that area.
- **NSStackView.Gravity**: The gravity areas available in a stack view.
